name: freemail
description: A database of free and disposable email domains and a handy Node.js module for querying it.

scripts.prepare: npm run prepare-disposable && npm run prepare-free && standard --fix
scripts.prepare-disposable: printf 'module.exports = `' > disposable.js; cat data/disposable.txt >> disposable.js; printf '`' >> disposable.js
scripts.prepare-free: printf 'module.exports = `' > free.js; cat data/free.txt >> free.js; printf '`' >> free.js

author: Will White <will@mapbox.com>
